Ability.Name: -- Hotkeys --
Ability.Lua:
--Pause/the/rotation!
if not leftkeydown then leftkeydown = 0 end
if IsLeftControlKeyDown() and GetTime() - leftkeydown > 1 then leftkeydown = GetTime()
if StopRota then
StopRota = false print("Rotation reenabled!")
else
StopRota = true print("Rotation stopped!")
end end
--Pause/the/rotation!
if not rightkeydown then rightkeydown = 0 end
if IsRightControlKeyDown() and GetTime() - rightkeydown > 1 then leftkeydown = GetTime()
if UseCD then
UseCD = false print("Cooldowns disabled!")
else
UseCD = true print("Cooldowns enabled!")
end end

Ability.Name: -- Start Fight --
Ability.Lua: if StopRota or UnitIsDeadOrGhost("player") or IsMounted() or UnitChannelInfo("player") ~= nil or UnitCastingInfo("player") ~= nil or UnitBuff("player", "Essen") or UnitBuff("player", "Trinken") then return true end

Ability.Name: All:Tank Target
Ability.Lua:
if GetNumPartyMembers() > 0 and UnitInRaid("player") == nil then
local heisthetank = nil
for i = 1, GetNumPartyMembers(), 1 do if UnitGroupRolesAssigned("party"..tostring(i)) == "TANK" then heisthetank = "party"..tostring(i) end end
if heisthetank and UnitExists("target") == nil and UnitAffectingCombat(heisthetank) and UnitAffectingCombat(heisthetank.."target") and UnitIsDead(heisthetank.."target") == nil and UnitCanAttack("player",heisthetank.."target") then TargetUnit(heisthetank.."target") end
end

Ability.Name: All:Hunter's Mark
Ability.Lua: if UnitCanAttack("player","target") and UnitIsDead("target") == nil and UnitHealth("target") > UnitHealthMax("player") and UnitDebuffID("target", 53338) == nil and UnitLevel("target") == -1 and IsSpellInRange("Hunter's Mark", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: All:Kill Command
Ability.Lua: if UnitLevel("target") == -1 then return true end

Ability.Name: All:Call of the Wild
Ability.Lua: if UnitLevel("target") == -1 and IsSpellInRange("Kill Shot", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: All:Kill Shot
Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") <= 20 and IsSpellInRange("Kill Shot", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: -- Offensive Spells --
Ability.Lua: if UnitAffectingCombat("player") == nil or ( not UnitAffectingCombat("target") and not UnitIsPlayer("target") ) then return true end

Ability.Name: All:Tranquilizing Shot
Ability.Lua: local i = 1 local buff,_,_,_,bufftype = UnitBuff("target", i) while buff do if bufftype == "Magic" or buff == "Enrage" and IsSpellInRange("Tranquilizing Shot", "target") == 1 then return true end i = i + 1; buff,_,_,_,bufftype = UnitBuff("target", i) end

Ability.Name: All:Aspect of the Dragonhawk
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID("player",61847) == nil and UnitPower("player") / UnitPowerMax("player") * 100 > 10 then return true end

Ability.Name: All:Rapid Fire
Ability.Lua: if UnitLevel("target") == -1 and IsSpellInRange("Kill Shot", "target") == 1 and UnitBuffID("player", 3045) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: SV:Explosive Shot (LnL)
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Explosive Shot", "target") == 1 and UnitBuffID("player", 56453) then return true end

Ability.Name: All:Misdirection
Ability.Lua: local InParty = GetNumPartyMembers() if InParty > 0 and UnitInRaid("player") == nil then for i = 1, InParty, 1 do local member = "party"..tostring(i) if UnitGroupRolesAssigned(member) == "TANK" and UnitThreatSituation(member,"target") ~= 3 and PQR_SpellAvailable(34477) then CastSpellByName("Misdirection") SpellTargetUnit(member) end end end

Ability.Name: MM:Trueshot Aura
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID("player",19506) ~= nil then return false else return true end

Ability.Name: SV:Black Arrow
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Black Arrow", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: All:Steady Shot
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Steady Shot", "target") == 1 and PQR_IsCastingSpell(49052) == false then return true end

Ability.Name: All:Aimed Shot
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Aimed Shot", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: All:Serpent Sting
Ability.Lua: if UnitDebuffID("target", 49001, "player") == nil and IsSpellInRange("Serpent Sting", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: USE:Mouseover Skill
Ability.Lua: if UnitAffectingCombat("player") and IsMouseButtonDown() then RunMacroText("/click "..GetMouseFocus():GetName()) end

Ability.Name: MM:Silencing Shot

Ability.Name: All:Aspect of the Viper

Ability.Name: MM:Chimera Shot

Ability.Name: All:Arcane Shot
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Arcane Shot", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: BM:Bestial Wrath
Ability.Lua: if UnitLevel("target") == -1 and IsSpellInRange("Kill Shot", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: MM:Volley
Ability.Lua: if IsRightShiftKeyDown() and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() and not UnitChannelInfo("player") then CastSpellByID(58434) if SpellIsTargeting() then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end return true end

Ability.Name: MM:Multi-Shot
Ability.Lua: if IsLeftShiftKeyDown() and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then return true end
